title: [Large-scale] Customized University English Writing Scaffolding Education for Working Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English grammar and writing, with experience in drafting workplace reports
context.additional_context: Genre-based education applicable to practical document writing in corporate settings, with a collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can write a 2,000-word English academic paper that clearly reflects an argument structure (introduction-body-conclusion).
Learners can complete a research report that integrates three or more credible sources per research topic while adhering to academic writing conventions.
Learners can revise and submit a 1,500-word persuasive essay that systematically develops counterarguments based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
